item.value: This should begin accumulating lightmaps which apply to your objects, so you can start jittering lighting to achieve the texture-space effect you're looking for.

To use, simply construct a `ProgressiveLightMap` object, `plmap.addObjectsToLightMap(object)` an array of semi-static objects and lights to the class once, and then call `plmap.update(camera)` every frame to begin accumulating lighting samples.
TODO (abelnation): update vAreaShadowCoord with area light info
Offsetting the position used for querying occlusion along the world normal can be used to reduce shadow acne.

Handles the creation of the loading screen of the application. A script can subscribe to the events of a {@link Application} to show a loading screen, progress bar etc. In order for this to work you need to set the project's loading screen script to the script that calls this method.
This function is called internally by PlayCanvas applications made in the Editor but you will need to call start yourself if you are using the engine stand-alone.
create tick function to be wrapped in closure
class representing an entry in the final order of rendering of cameras and layers in the engine this is populated at runtime based on LayerComposition

Layer represents a renderable subset of the scene. It can contain a list of mesh instances, lights and cameras, their render settings and also defines custom callbacks before, after or during rendering. Layers are organized inside {@link LayerComposition} in a desired order.
True means only semi-transparent objects are rendered, and false means opaque.
The graphics device used to manage this layer composition. If it is not provided, a device is obtained
A scene is graphical representation of an environment.
used by component systems to speed up destruction
Interface for tagging graph nodes. Tag based searches can be performed using the {@link GraphNodefindByTag} function.

When an entity that has properties that contain references to other entities within its subtree is duplicated, the expectation of the user is likely that those properties will be updated to point to the corresponding entities within the newly-created duplicate subtree.
Components are specific to an instance of an Entity and are attached
The Component and ComponentSystem provide the logic to give an Entity a specific type of behavior.
